synopsis.text:
Mai, Riko, and Midori are three young girls living together in a geisha house in the heart of Kyoto, all sharing the same dream: to become maiko, apprentice geishas renowned for their captivating dance and song performances. As they work diligently at an inn and hone their skills, their bond of friendship and trust deepens.

However, their aspirations are put to the test when they learn that only two maiko from each house can participate in an upcoming festival. This revelation ignites a spark of competition among the trio, as they each strive to prove their worth and secure a spot in the coveted event.

As the festival approaches, the girls must confront a difficult choice: to pursue their long-held dream at the risk of jeopardizing their friendship, or to preserve the precious bond they have formed. Set against the enchanting backdrop of Kyoto, this poignant tale explores the delicate balance between ambition and loyalty.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
